title: Why fluoridation?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Dentistry

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teeth - Care and hygiene

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Water fluoridation
description: Presents only positive aspects of adding fluoride to the community water supply. Discusses fluoridation and its effectiveness, and explains why fluoridation of water supply is preferable to topical application of fluoride to the teeth or the adding of fluoride to milk.
